title: parpala
sahitya:
parpala.  rAgA: khamAs (paN).  tALA: rUpaka
 


1:  parpala porpaNi yADai minna nin padma mukham malarndiTTadennE
  pAdum iLam kuyilE aruL tEDum iLam kuyilE
  bhAvA en mannattAval tIrap-pagarndiDu peN kuyilE
 caraNam 2    shirparanai tyAga nar-peyarALanai cintittAlE malarndadaDi
  adum iLamayilE aruL tEDu madamayilE
  shIrvAzhArUr nAthan perumai sheppundaram allavE
 caraNam 3    shIrum shirappum uDaiyavaLE avar pErum perumaiyum shollaDiyO
  peNgaL shikhAmaNiyE ninninbap-pEccukkEdu iNaiyE
  pEdAyinRu vishEDa mennadhaip-pEshaDi paiN-kuyilE
 caraNam 4    tErum tirunALum kaN koLAd-divya sEvaiyaiyum nI arindilaiyO
  dEvar shikhAmaNiyai anbar tEdum cintAmaNiyai
  shenrangonrAi sEvaDiyaip-pADi shErvOmaDamayilE
 caraNam 5    pADalA-maruNADalAm enra pAnguDai enrOzhi narkuyilE
  pDdinAl enna payan nammaip-pArkka varuvArO
  paNdengEnuNG kaNdadhundO pagarndhidu poRkuyilE
 caraNam 6    kaNDariyEn kAdal koNDuLEn enaik-kaiviDamATTAi en pAngiyE kEL
  kAdukaTkinbamaDi avaruru kANamuDiyAdaDi
  kaNNE enranaik-kAdalODuLLam kalandaNaivAraDi
 caraNam 7    nin maNavALan vaDivam guNamedu nErizhaiyE paghar pUNkuyilE
  tanmai iyampaDiyO avar tangumiDam EdaDi
  tAi-tandai yAr kulagOttiramEdadai shATraDi mANkuyilE
 caraNam 8    veNmai shhivappuk-karuppum allavoru vIDODiruppiDam Edumilai
  peNNali ANumalla avaraip-peTravar Arumillai
  pEdhaay naadhan jaadhikulangaLai EdhenRu solvEnadi.
 caraNam 9    jAti kulangaL izhandhavar pAl kAdal koLLuvadu nItiyAgumODi
  unranak-kIdhazhagO un manNam pOnavAr iduvO
  uTrAr peTrAr urAr arindiDil metthap-pazhiyArODi
 caraNam 10    UnamillAda av-vuttamanaik-kurit-tInamozhi sahiyEnaDi
  uTravar peTravarum avaranri maTravar yAvaradi
  tAnE nAnAi nAnE tAnAit-tanmayamAnOmaDi
